original_text: I speak clearly to him, as I come near to him. I do not say things to him that are hard to understand. He even sees the shape of the Lord. So you should have been afraid to speak against my servant Moses!’
korean_text: 그와는 내가 대면하여 명백히 말하고 은밀한 말로 하지 아니하며 그는 또 여호와의 형상을 보거늘 너희가 어찌하여 내 종 모세 비방하기를 두려워하지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: as I come near to him
I do not say things to him
He even sees the shape of the Lord
So you should have been afraid
to speak against my servant Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 종 모세를 대적하여 말하는 것을
